channel.title: [PI] RsReloaded [/PI]
channel.description:
[center]Yeah, I'm starting a dev Team I guess.[/center] [center]The Team: 1. Me 2. I Vain I (Thomas)[/center] [code]Name: Coding Experiences: Types of Languages: How long?: Age: Apply for? PHP\Java(Must know mysql)[/code]
[center]Features:
[b]Base DSPK(Destination-PK)[/b] (I just copied the features from his release thread)
1000x XP Rate Stable Economy Full Jad, start at 360's 255 Region Fix Anti Cheat Client No Dupes Curse Prayers Full Divine Spirit Shield Full Arcane Spirit Shield Full Elysian Spirit Shield Full Spectral Spirit Shield
100% Dragon Claws Active PK'ing "Lagg" Fixes Proper Item Switching Switching Tab (HP Bar, Hitmarks etc...) Switch Between Playing In 525 Or 317 Graphics Corporeal Beast Full Godwars (With Killcount Noway to Clip Into A Chamber) 24/7 With Rarely Any Downtime Or Lagg All skills (Added Agility in) RFD Minigame Warrior's Guild Steel & Iron Dragons Hill Giants Tormented Demons King Black Dragon Coinshare Lootshare
Staff of light (Real Effects and special attack) PvP Armors PvP Zones NPC Clipping Auto Donation Donator Zone Donator Tab Donator Items Chaotic Weapons & Armors
PVP SYSTEM:
To get there click the "PK" Tab and you should know the next steps. Teleporting in combat will decrease your EP by 10-15%[/center]
Now.. Here's my dedicated servers.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/k1e4w4.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] RsReloaded [/PI]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=rash link=topic=471492.msg3449154#msg3449154 date=1293620218]
What exactly are your goals?
[/quote]We’re developing a server that is aimed both towards Pking, and Skilling, with a few extra minigames here and there.

We wish it to have a wonderful economy, so we will be redoing all drop systems, skills, shops etc, and stablizing the economy at a better/slower pace.

Skills will be revamped, with a few extra added.

Latest update: redid the ep system, so you don’t just stand in wild for EP.[/quote]

Ah, okay.

Good luck with this

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] RsReloaded [/PI]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

Canownueazy:

where did u find dedis using xampp? turns on trollface

These are good Dedi’s From companys. Not Rsps, & yes they were hacked (Through exploits\sql injections I used). Well one of them was a xampp exploit above.
Most people don’t secure there things for some reason… I can go on the moparscape server status & probably find about 10 in a few minutes, but I don’t mess with those people really.

Oh & I found by getting a Dedi IP & changing the last digits form 1-255 finding exploitable ones. & Also, why trollface? lol.
& plus pretty much 60% of people in the Moparscape ServerStatus use Xampp & don’t secure it properly allowing shells to be uploaded ect, or they just have vulnerable sql injections.

Read full topic
